mapper.insert: insert into cw_base_victory (victory_name, solve_time, case_code, case_type, case_detail, picture_one, picture_two, picture_three, picture_four, picture_five, create_time, update_time, status) value (#{victoryName}, #{solveTime}, #{caseCode}, #{caseType}, #{caseDetail}, #{pictureOne}, #{pictureTwo}, #{pictureThree}, #{pictureFour}, #{pictureFive}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{status})
mapper.update: update cw_base_victory set victory_name = #{victoryName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, solve_time = #{solveTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, case_code = #{caseCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, case_type = #{caseType, jdbcType=INTEGER}, case_detail = #{caseDetail, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picture_one = #{pictureOne, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picture_two = #{pictureTwo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picture_three = #{pictureThree, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picture_four = #{pictureFour, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picture_five = #{pictureFive, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id}
update cw_base_victory set status = 0 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT v.id, v.victory_name as victoryName, GROUP_CONCAT(distinct cp.user_id) as userIds, GROUP_CONCAT(distinct cp.user_name) as userNames, v.solve_time as solveTime, v.case_code as caseCode, v.case_type as caseType, v.case_detail as caseDetail, v.picture_one as pictureOne, v.picture_two as pictureTwo, v.picture_three as pictureThree, v.picture_four as pictureFour, v.picture_five as pictureFive, e.enumName as caseTypeName FROM cw_base_victory v LEFT JOIN cw_base_enum e ON e.enumType = 'CASE_TYPE' AND v.case_type = e.enumValue LEFT JOIN cw_base_case_police cp ON cp.victory_id = v.id where v.id = #{id}
